short_summary: Rental Vehicle Services for 12 June to 10 August 2024
description: The Canadian Armed Forces (CAF) requires the provision of services in the Honolulu Area, HI, USA, for rental vehicles.
full_summary:
========================================================

# RIMPAC Vehicle Rentals

### Tender Title:
Location de véhicules pour RIMPAC

### Notice Reference Number:
CB-963-21499089

### Tender Notice Information:

* Publication Date: April 30, 2024
* Tender Closing Date: May 15, 2024, 14:00:00
* Amendment Date: May 15, 2024

### Tender Description:
The Canadian Armed Forces (CAF) is seeking a contractor to provide services for rental vehicles in the Honolulu Area, HI, USA. The services are required from June 12 to August 10, 2024 to support the deployment of the CAF to the Rim of the Pacific Exercise (RIMPAC) 2024. The services must satisfy specific requirements and meet certain selection criteria.

### Tender Requirements:
The contractor will be responsible for:

* Providing rental vehicles to support the CAF deployment to the Rim of the Pacific Exercise (RIMPAC) 2024
* Meeting specific requirements for the vehicles and services

### Selection Criteria:
The tender will be awarded based on the lowest price.

### Contact Information:

Taylor Komery
E-mail: [taylor.komery@forces.gc.ca](mailto:taylor.komery@forces.gc.ca)
Phone: (343) 574-5295

### Notice Documents:

The tender notice and supporting documents can be found online at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca](https://canadabuys.canada.ca)

* Tender Notice: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca](https://canadabuys.canada.ca)
* Questions and Answers: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca](https://canadabuys.canada.ca)

### Trade Agreements:
This tender is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

### Regions of Opportunity and Delivery:
The services are required in the Honolulu Area, HI, USA. The vehicles must be delivered to the designated locations in the region.

### Contracting Entity:
The contracting entity is the National Defence, MGen George Pearkes Building, 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, Ontario, Canada K1A 0K2. NOTE: You don't need to change everything. I recommend a more professional format and grammar correction. The rephrased entry should match the requirements. Also, please check for spelling errors and consistency.  * nobody has an SSL recommendation   COMMENTED OUT LINE AFTER
